TopicTitle: EVE (Environmental Visual Enhancements) borked - opaque pink kerbal sky

Articles.Content:
I've tried this with and without texture replacer and have just reinstalled KSP x32 with JUST the EVE mod.

With the EVE-LR version, I get the clouds looking like they should. Which is nice, but they're TOO low res for my taste.

With the 'regular' EVE version, I get an opaque pink sky covering ALL of Kerbin.

Edited August 31, 2015 by vger
